lore: Despite the rebellion's success and the abolition of slavery, illegal Brownie trafficking still exists. This despicable practice is persecuted by the authorities, but that is not always enough. The Brownie Loner is a hero known among its own people, a veteran warrior who secretly investigates these activities, goes into the lairs of the criminals and defeats them with its bow. In cities such as Nex and Vanelin, it is rewarded for its services, though it always shares the money with the poor.
menagerieDialog: Could we slow down a little, buddy?
I'M GONNA BASH THEIR BRAINS IN!\n\n(Its threats would seem a lot more promising if this creature's voice wasn't so high-pitched.)
I like to think of myself as the leader of our group. Don't worry - you're my second in command!
(Both its weapon and its temper are comically oversized for its body.)
name: Brownie Loner
